step.html_instructions: At the roundabout, take the 3rd exit onto ш. Московское/Р178
At the roundabout, take the 2nd exit onto Р178
At the roundabout, take the 2nd exit and stay on Р178

At the roundabout, take the 2nd exit onto Р158/Р180
Continue to follow Р158
At the roundabout, take the 3rd exit and stay on Р180
At the roundabout, take the 2nd exit and stay on а/д Урал/Е30/М5
Continue straight to stay on а/д Урал/Е30/М5
Continue straight to stay on а/д Урал/Е30/М5

Turn right to stay on а/д Урал/Е30/М5
Continue to follow М5

Merge onto Московское малое кольцо/Улица Льва Толстого/ш. Новорязанское/А-107/М5 via the ramp to ДОМОДЕДОВО/КАШИРА
Continue to follow Московское малое кольцо/ш. Новорязанское/А-107/М5
Keep right at the fork, follow signs for М2/МОСКВА and merge onto М2
At the roundabout, take the 2nd exit and stay on ул. Орджоникидзе
At the roundabout, take the 1st exit onto ул. Комсомольская
At the roundabout, take the 2nd exit and stay on ул. Комсомольская
